attributes.description: The best performing street legal BMW M4 of all time · Reduction in weight of up to 100 kg compared with BMW M4 Competition Coupé · 405 kW high-performance, 405 kW high-performance M TwinPower Turbo inline 6-cylinder petrol engine, Exclusive design with model signatures in Red and Black, The BMW M4 Competition Coupé sets the peak performance mark for the BMW 4 Series Coupé M Automobiles. Equipped with a 375 kW high-performance M TwinPower Turbo inline 6-cylinder petrol engine and numerous drivetrain and chassis technologies derived from motorsport, this sports coupé offers typical M driving dynamics at a supreme level. The optional all-wheel drive M xDrive with Active M Differential guarantees maximum driving dynamics at all times both in everyday use and on the race track. A powerful design language at the front, side and rear alongside optional M specific Carbon features on the exterior and in the interior underline the athletic character of the vehicle.
